results.content: This format is easy to follow, easy to revisit, and fun to learn for starters like me.
results.content_html: This format is easy to follow, easy to revisit, and fun to learn for starters like me.

results.content: I found this course to be great at covering the basics on a surface level in understanding on the textbook meaning of each of these fundamentals, however I was disappointed at how short/brief each section was covered. Given the cost of this course I'd hoped each subject would have more in-depth examples and, ultimately, more learning tools/drawing prompts to make the course more engaging, but found it to have less substance as the course went on. The warm-up activity in the beginning of this course was fantastic- it would be great if more exercises like that one were added, along with more visual examples of painted work.
results.content_html: I found this course to be great at covering the basics on a surface level in understanding on the textbook meaning of each of these fundamentals, however I was disappointed at how short/brief each section was covered. Given the cost of this course I'd hoped each subject would have more in-depth examples and, ultimately, more learning tools/drawing prompts to make the course more engaging, but found it to have less substance as the course went on. The warm-up activity in the beginning of this course was fantastic- it would be great if more exercises like that one were added, along with more visual examples of painted work.

results.content: Was unsure what I would learn in an hour but have a greater appreciation for the basics needed for a good piece of art. Would have liked some more visual examples now and then but otherwise very useful.
results.content_html: Was unsure what I would learn in an hour but have a greater appreciation for the basics needed for a good piece of art. Would have liked some more visual examples now and then but otherwise very useful.

results.content: This course provides the needed foundational techniques to really improve one's artwork. I'm looking forward to applying my newfound skills!
results.content_html: This course provides the needed foundational techniques to really improve one's artwork. I'm looking forward to applying my newfound skills!

results.content: The course was informative and relatively easy to follow and understand. I've managed to gain a deeper understanding of concepts that were previously known to me while also learning about many new things.
results.content_html: The course was informative and relatively easy to follow and understand. I've managed to gain a deeper understanding of concepts that were previously known to me while also learning about many new things.

results.content: It’s the same content as in the Character Animation Course
results.content_html: It’s the same content as in the Character Animation Course

results.content: I’m enjoying it, but I’m not very far in yet. I have experience drawing, but I’ve gotten out of the habit, so I’d like to develop my skills.
results.content_html: I’m enjoying it, but I’m not very far in yet. I have experience drawing, but I’ve gotten out of the habit, so I’d like to develop my skills.

results.content: it was quite informative  and interesting.
Solid road map to a future in art making.
results.content_html: Solid road map to a future in art making.

results.content: So far it is an excellent course for me. I always started with detail. Only the last few months - reading through art books - I relized
